articles.author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
articles.title: Monkeypox: WHO reports drop in number of cases worldwide - DW (English)
articles.description: The number of monkeypox cases dropped globally by 21% in the last week, reversing a monthlong trend of rising infections, the World Health Organization said. However, numbers continue to rise in the Americas.
articles.content:
The number of  monkeypox cases reported globally has decreased, according to a World Health Organization (WHO) report issued Thursday.
In the week from August 15-21, there were 21% fewer cases than … [+2043 chars]

articles.title: Unvaccinated Novak Djokovic out of U.S. Open, can't travel to America - CBC Sports
articles.description: Novak Djokovic will not play in the U.S. Open, as expected, because he is not vaccinated against COVID-19 and thus is not allowed to travel to the United States.
articles.content:
Novak Djokovic will not play in the U.S. Open, as expected, because he is not vaccinated against COVID-19 and thus is not allowed to travel to the United States.
